Hydras/Kup/Talon/Nightlight/Perceptor Darkhawk

Darkhawk breathed Heavely, still stunned but fully conceus. Hydras looking 
with hatred tucson yelled "OPEN FIRE!!!!!!"

Perceptor following commands Shot against the maximals and autobots.

Meanwhile Kup managed to go outside the base with Nightlight who still was 
sleeping, Kup spotted the Maximal shuttle and blessing his good luck ran 
towards it. Talong looking him arrive opened the door and let hem in and 
send a private comlink to Tucson "Kup and Nighlight are with me, if you are 
hurry we can leave this place for good together... I have the ticket for our 
freedom"

Kup laydown Nightlight and tried to acomodate her the most confortable that 
he could.
